Translations.Text: higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
tannodeyana munde nillalikkide endu anjuttiddavanige (andu) eraderadu totagaliruvavu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avu dharala sakhegaliruva (totagalagiruvavu)
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli eraderadu jharigalu hariyuttiruvavu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli ella jatiya hannugala eraderadu bagegaliruvavu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avaru resme hodisida neladalli dimbugalige oragikondiruvaru mattu eradu totagala hannugalu avarige samipavagiruvavu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli, drsti taggisiruva striyariruvaru. Ivariginta munna avarannu manavaragali jinn‌galagali muttiralararu
Higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avarella manikya hagu havalagalo embantiruvaru

averadallade innu eradu totagalive

higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri

higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella anugrahagalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli susileyarada sundariyariruvaru
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
a svarga kan'yeyaru sibiragalalli avitiruvaru

avaru hasiru hodike hagu nunupada dimbugala mele oragiruvaru
